title: Driver satisfaction with Uber U.S. 2017 to 2019
summary: This grouped bar chart shows SOME LABEL on the Y-axis for 5 different Responses for 3 groups 2017, 2018, and 2019 that are presented on the X-axis.
Out of all 3 groups, 2018 had the highest SOME LABEL in Response Somewhat agree and 2018 had the lowest SOME LABEL in Response Strongly disagree.
Among all the Responses, 2018 had the highest SOME LABEL in Response Somewhat agree and lowest SOME LABEL in Response Strongly disagree.
The maximum SOME LABEL for 2018 that was found in Response Somewhat agree was 5.29 times larger than the minimum SOME LABEL observed in Response Strongly disagree.
min_summary: This grouped bar chart shows SOME LABEL on the Y-axis for 5 different Responses for 3 groups 2017, 2018, and 2019 that are presented on the X-axis.
In Response Somewhat agree, 2018 had the highest SOME LABEL 434.0 among the 3 groups and in Strongly disagree, 2018 had the lowest SOME LABEL 82.0.

max_summary: This grouped bar chart represents 5 different Responses on X-axis for 3 groups 2017, 2018, and 2019. On the Y-axis it shows their corresponding SOME LABEL.
Out of all 3 groups, 2018 had the highest SOME LABEL in Response Somewhat agree and 2018 had the lowest SOME LABEL in Response Strongly disagree.
Among all the Responses, 2018 had the highest SOME LABEL 434.0 in Response Somewhat agree and lowest value 82.0 in Response Strongly disagree.
The maximum SOME LABEL for 2018 that was found in Response Somewhat agree was 5.29 times larger than the minimum SOME LABEL observed in Response Strongly disagree.
Among the groups, 2018 had the biggest difference in SOME LABEL. Where the maximum SOME LABEL was 5.29 times larger than the minimum SOME LABEL.
2018 had the maximum SOME LABEL out of all 3 groups in Response Somewhat agree followed by 2018 in Somewhat agree, and the minimum SOME LABEL is found for 2018 in Strongly disagree.
Averaging all 3 groups 2017, 2018, and 2019, the Response Somewhat agree is the maximum SOME LABEL and Strongly disagree is the minimum SOME LABEL.
